last_episode_to_air.name: The Discovery
last_episode_to_air.overview: Resendo takes the ultimate step towards killing Zorro and the de la Vegas.

name: Zorro
overview:
Zorro, also known as The New Zorro, New World Zorro, and Zorro 1990, is an American action-adventure drama series featuring Duncan Regehr as the character of Zorro. Regehr portrayed the fearless Latino hero and fencer on The Family Channel from 1990 to 1993. The series was shot entirely in Madrid, Spain and produced by New World Television, The Family Channel, Ellipse Programme of Canal Plus, Beta TV, and RAI. 88 episodes of the series were produced, 10 more than the first Zorro television series, which was produced by Disney in the late 1950s.

Since 2011, the series is currently airing in the United States on the Retro Television Network as The New Zorro. Peter Rodgers Organization is the distributor for this version of Zorro.

episodes.name: Dead Men Tell No Tales
episodes.overview: Victoria is accused of murder.

episodes.name: Deceptive Heart
episodes.overview: Diego is suspicious of his father's fiancée.

episodes.name: Water
episodes.overview: The Alcalde monopolizes the pueblo's water supply.

episodes.name: Double Entendre
episodes.overview: The Alcalde hires a professional swordsman to discredit Zorro by impersonating him.

episodes.name: The Best Man
episodes.overview: Rafael de la Vega's fiancée falls in love with Zorro.

episodes.name: The Sure Thing
episodes.overview: To get rich, a farmer gambles everything.

episodes.name: Zorro's Other Woman
episodes.overview: Zorro becomes the guardian of a kidnapped baby.

episodes.name: The Legend Begins (1)
episodes.overview: Zorro falls into a gully and, semi-conscious, remembers how he became Zorro. All the while, the Alcalde's soldiers are closing in. This originally aired as a made-for-cable movie based on the series.

episodes.name: The Legend Begins (2)
episodes.overview: Zorro falls into a gully and, semi-conscious, remembers how he became Zorro. All the while, the Alcalde's soldiers are closing in. This originally aired as a made-for-cable movie based on the series.

episodes.name: The Legend Begins (3)
episodes.overview: Zorro falls into a gully and, semi-conscious, remembers how he became Zorro. All the while, the Alcalde's soldiers are closing in. This originally aired as a made-for-cable movie based on the series.

episodes.name: The Legend Begins (4)
episodes.overview: Zorro falls into a gully and, semi-conscious, remembers how he became Zorro. All the while, the Alcalde's soldiers are closing in. This originally aired as a made-for-cable movie based on the series.

episodes.name: Pride of the Pueblo
episodes.overview: The Alcalde forces a black man to fight for his freedom. Phillip Michael Thomas guest stars.

episodes.name: Honor Thy Father
episodes.overview: Don Alejandro is shot by bandits.

episodes.name: The Magician
episodes.overview: A magician pays Victoria attention, and Diego questions his intentions.

episodes.name: A Deal with the Devil
episodes.overview: Colonel Palomarez tries to capture Zorro.

episodes.name: Whereabouts
episodes.overview: An English journalist tries to discover Zorro's real identity.

episodes.name: All That Glitters
episodes.overview: The Alcalde tries to recover a stolen gem for himself. Valentine Pelka guest stars.

episodes.name: Child's Play
episodes.overview: A young landowner bullies his tenants, and a young boy cares for the injured Toronado.

episodes.name: A Wolf in Sheep's Clothing
episodes.overview: A new priest arouses Diego's suspicions.

episodes.name: Ghost Story
episodes.overview: Sergeant Mendoza inherits a haunted hacienda.

episodes.name: The Bounty Hunters
episodes.overview: Native Indians are accused of a crime by the bounty hunter who committed it.

episodes.name: The Unhappy Medium
episodes.overview: A fake medium and her accomplice cheat the local cabelleros.

episodes.name: An Explosive Situation
episodes.overview: The accomplice from "The Unhappy Medium" returns for revenge.

episodes.name: Family Business
episodes.overview: A woman claims to be Felipe's mother. Hunter Tylo stars.

episodes.name: Palomarez Returns
episodes.overview: Colonel Palomarez returns to even the score with Zorro.

episodes.name: The Wizard
episodes.overview: The Alcalde employs an eccentric inventor to capture Zorro. Adam West stars.

episodes.name: Master & Pupil
episodes.overview: Diego's fencing master, Sir Edmund Kendall, arrives from Madrid. Peter Diamond guest stars, who was the stunt co-ordinator/swordmaster for the series.

episodes.name: Kidnapped
episodes.overview: Pirate Captain Henry Stark wants new recruits.

episodes.name: The Tease
episodes.overview: Diego gives Sergeant Mendoza lessons in romance.

episodes.name: He Who Lives By the Sword
episodes.overview: Zorro gives the Alcalde fencing lessons to defeat a swordsman terrorising the pueblo.

episodes.name: Freedom of the Press
episodes.overview: Diego becomes editor of the peublo newspaper, the Los Angeles Guardian.

episodes.name: Sanctuary
episodes.overview: Bitten by a snake, Zorro has to hide in the barn of the man who is hunting him.

episodes.name: The Chase
episodes.overview: The Alcalde employs an Indian to track Zorro. Oliver Haden stars.

episodes.name: Broken Heart, Broken Mask
episodes.overview: Victoria is shot, and Diego is devastated at the thought of losing her. Roddy Piper stars

episodes.name: The White Sheep of the Family
episodes.overview: The Alcalde's twin brother causes trouble for Zorro.

episodes.name: The Challenge
episodes.overview: Bounty hunters hunt a cowboy. Doug McClure stars.

episodes.name: Rites of Passage
episodes.overview: Felipe has to fight for the hand of a native Indian girl.

episodes.name: The Falcon
episodes.overview: A man calling himself "The Falcon" attempts to overthrow the Alcalde.

episodes.name: It's a Wonderful Zorro
episodes.overview: Diego has a cold and is depressed until the mysterious Don Fernando shows him what Los Angeles would be like had Zorro never existed.

episodes.name: The Marked Man
episodes.overview: Felipe discovers a plot to kill the Alcalde. Peter Postlethwaite and Roger Lloyd Pack star.

episodes.name: Big Brother
episodes.overview: Diego defends a man accused of robbery. Andre the Giant stars.

episodes.name: To Be A Man
episodes.overview: A teenager wants to prove his manhood.

episodes.name: The Whistling Bandit
episodes.overview: A bandit robs the people of Los Angeles while whistling Beethoven's Ninth Symphony.

episodes.name: The Don's Dilemma
episodes.overview: Diego's father, Don Alejandro, is appointed temporary Alcalde and tasked with the job of capturing Zorro. Garfield Morgan stars.

episodes.name: The Jewelled Sword
episodes.overview: A midget plots to steal Charlemagne's sword, which is in the custody of the Alcalde. Warwick Davis stars.

episodes.name: The Newcomers
episodes.overview: Zorro helps an Amish family persecuted because of their beliefs.

episodes.name: The Devil's Fortress (1)
episodes.overview: Diego searches for Victoria's father while being followed by Sergeant Mendoza, Victoria, her brother Ramon, and the Alcalde. This originally aired as an hour-long episode. Note: The episode is told in flashback form by the modern decedents of Zorro.

episodes.name: The Devil's Fortress (2)
episodes.overview: Zorro must find a way into the fortress. This originally aired as an hour-long episode.

episodes.name: One For All (1)
episodes.overview: Diego travels to France on vacation. With part 2 broadcast as a single episode (originally aired as an hour-long episode).

episodes.name: One For All (2)
episodes.overview: Diego meets the descendents of the Three Musketeers. This originally aired as an hour-long episode.

episodes.name: The New Broom
episodes.overview: The new Alcade, Ignacio de Soto, arrives in Los Angeles.

episodes.name: Rush to Judgement
episodes.overview: Diego and Sergeant Mendoza try to save an innocent man from the gallows.

episodes.name: A New Lease on Love
episodes.overview: The Alcalde has a secret weapon to kill Zorro.

episodes.name: The Man Who Cried Wolf
episodes.overview: Zorro seeks justice for an innocent settler. Roddy Piper stars.

episodes.name: Armed & Dangerous
episodes.overview: Zorro has to save Victoria, who has been taken captive by a gang of jailbreakers. Note: Filmed during season 2.

episodes.name: The Buccaneers
episodes.overview: The pirate Big Jim Jarrett and his men arrive in Los Angeles and are arrested by the Alcalde, who is hoping to find their hidden treasure. Jesse Ventura stars.

episodes.name: A New Beginning
episodes.overview: The Alcalde has Jim Jarrett's son kidnapped to force him to reveal the location of the treasure. Jesse Ventura stars.

episodes.name: A Woman Scorned
episodes.overview: Zorro falls for a jealous woman suspected of murder.

episodes.name: Wicked, Wicked Zorro
episodes.overview: Diego is hypnotized and led into a life of crime. Tim Reid stars.

episodes.name: Alejandro Rides Again
episodes.overview: Diego's father, Don Alejandro, and his old army comrades hunt a murderer. Robert Hoy, Bernard Kay, George Bullock star. Filmed during the second season.

episodes.name: The Old Flame
episodes.overview: Diego's former lover arrives in the pueblo. Filmed during the second season.

episodes.name: Miracle of the Pueblo
episodes.overview: An elderly couple arrives with a letter written to Santa Claus by Sergeant Mendoza when he was a boy. Patsy Rowlands stars.

episodes.name: A Love Remembered
episodes.overview: Don Alejandro's old love visits the pueblo.

episodes.name: Dirty Tricks
episodes.overview: Victoria contests the election for Alcalde.

episodes.name: Mendoza the Malevolent
episodes.overview: Pursuing Zorro, Mendoza is injured and suffers amnesia.

episodes.name: Test of Faith
episodes.overview: Diego and Don Alejandro rescue a shipwrecked Japanese sailor. Soon-Tek Oh stars.

episodes.name: Siege
episodes.overview: Bandits surround the pueblo, Diego kills.

episodes.name: They Call Her Annie
episodes.overview: A female sharpshooter is employed to hunt Zorro.

episodes.name: Silk Purses and Sow's Ears
episodes.overview: Sergeant Mendoza awaits a promotion and Diego tries to teach him the manners of a gentleman.

episodes.name: Turning the Tables
episodes.overview: A Spanish emissary is given a taste of his own medicine.

episodes.name: One Special Night
episodes.overview: Diego and Victoria spend the night together during a storm. Filmed during the second season.

episodes.name: Balancing The Books
episodes.overview: The Alcalde tries to cheat Sergeant Mendoza of his lottery win.

episodes.name: Blind Man's Bluff
episodes.overview: Zorro and the Alcalde are temporarily blinded by poisoned water.

episodes.name: Heir Apparent
episodes.overview: Zorro is suspicious of the son of a deceased landowner who arrives to claim his inheritance. Kevin Brophy stars. Filmed during the second season.

episodes.name: The Word
episodes.overview: Felipe witnesses a murder and is pursued by the murderers. Albert Owens stars.

episodes.name: The Fox and the Rabbit
episodes.overview: A man calling himself El Conejo poses as a tax collector.

episodes.name: Ultimate Justice
episodes.overview: Zorro has to save the Alcalde's life when he strays on to sacred Indian lands.

episodes.name: Love Potion Number Nine
episodes.overview: Victoria accidentally gives a love potion to the Alcalde meant for Zorro.

episodes.name: As Ye Sow
episodes.overview: Two brothers are found dead in mysterious circumstances.

episodes.name: An Affair to Remember
episodes.overview: When Victoria is injured, Zorro takes her to his cave.

episodes.name: The Reward
episodes.overview: Three men claim a reward for a bandit.

episodes.name: Like Father, Like Son
episodes.overview: Don Alejandro suffering from amnesia thinks he is Zorro.

episodes.name: Symbol of Hope
episodes.overview: A dying child's wish inspires the Alcalde to capture Zorro.

episodes.name: My Word Is My Bond
episodes.overview: Victoria searches for a farmer she helped get released from jail.

episodes.name: The Arrival
episodes.overview: Gilberto Resendo, a tax collector from Spain, seizes control of Los Angeles.

episodes.name: Death & Taxes
episodes.overview: Resendo seizes church property.

episodes.name: Conundrum
episodes.overview: Toronado is captured and Resendo uses him to trap Zorro.

episodes.name: The Discovery
episodes.overview: Resendo takes the ultimate step towards killing Zorro and the de la Vegas.
